leagueRoasts.1: You are so bad at League of Legends that you make the game look bad. You are the worst player I have ever seen and you should probably just give up.
leagueRoasts.2: You are terrible at League of Legends. You can't even last hit a minion. You're so bad, you make Jinx look like a world-class player.
leagueRoasts.3: I would roast you but you'd probably think it had something to do with pizzas.
leagueRoasts.4: You're so bad at this game, you might as well uninstall it and go back to playing Farmville. Your K/D ratio is embarrassing, and you can't even last more than 10 minutes in a game without getting killed. You're definitely the worst player on our team, and everyone else is putting up with you because they feel sorry for you.
leagueRoasts.5: If you ordered pizza and had to pick it up because you had it delivered to the wrong place, your team probably would have won.
leagueRoasts.6: You have as much impact on lane as that scuttle crab over there. Also Your voice is annoying.
leagueRoasts.7: I wish you turned into a ward every time you died. Also wards last 90 seconds, so you would probably hit the three ward limit often...
leagueRoasts.8: Your brain has 2 parts, left and right. But your right brain has nothing left and your left brain has nothing right.
leagueRoasts.9: If you could throw baseballs half as fast as you threw this game, you could be a pitcher in the MLB.
leagueRoasts.10: I know you're doing your best but please stop, I want to win the game.

teamLoss.1: Noah couldn't even carry these animals.
teamLoss.2: Your team has less map awareness than Christopher Columbus.
teamLoss.3: The enemy team probably thought the tutorial was a harder challenge.
teamLoss.4: Your team fed so hard, you guys could have solved world hunger.
teamLoss.5: Can your team even beat the first level of super mario?
teamLoss.6: Can you guys come to my funeral so you can let me down one last time.
teamLoss.7: Your team was clearly out of their league. Maybe you should have stuck to playing with bots.
teamLoss.8: I would trade your team for 3 siege minions. Yes 3, 4 would be too generous.
teamLoss.9: Are you guys actually real players? Oh, I thought we were playing against bots.
teamLoss.10: I wish this team had Amumu on it. At least his tears are usefull.

genericRoasts.2: You're a disgrace to the game.
genericRoasts.3: (1) Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit. (2) Cut the 'user' into small, even pieces. (3) Spread the 'user' onto a baking sheet and roast for 10-12 minutes, or until the 'user' is golden brown and slightly crispy. (4) Enjoy!
genericRoasts.4: How are you so bad at a kids game?
genericRoasts.5: It's not letting me press E to take over this BOT!
genericRoasts.6: I think you should try picking up a new hobby.
genericRoasts.7: If underperforming was a job you'd be a millionare!
genericRoasts.8: You're the best player besides every other player I've ever met.
genericRoasts.10: Do you want a participation trophy?

wins.1: You're the best player in the lobby! Great job!
wins.2: You played an excellent game and deserved the win.
wins.3: Your opponent played very well, but you were better.
wins.4: Even though you only won because the other team was terrible, I still think you're a good player :).
wins.5: Although you may have won your game, you didn't play very well.
wins.6: Good job! I didn't think you had it in you to win.
wins.7: That victory was impressive, for a newbie.
wins.8: You nearly lost but thankfully you outskilled a bunch of bots.
wins.9: How does it feel to beat a bunch of little kids?
wins.10: Nice job on the win. You showed those bots <3.
